attributes.action: Make London an independent region that can remain within the EU
attributes.additional_details: No added info needed- we know what a mess we made
attributes.background: The decision for UK to leave the EU will leave the country in chaos. A city as big and as prominent as London should not be swept under the rug with this damaging vote. We propose that, as we were a majority-stay region, we should estrange from the rest of the U.K. and remain in the EU.
